page.title: 09Questionnaire
page.content: 32{Clovelly school children}gave these answers. {All families}have a radio. Most families have a cat; telephone; colour T.V.; bicycle; record player; car; live in a rented house; use the library; have a sunday paper and have work in Clovelly. {Most children}have travelled by car, train; were born in Barnstaple hospital; can swim; and have only been to one school. {About half}of the families have a dog, a daily paper, and have visited London Only{a few families}have a video, a piano, do B&B, go to the theatre and go to the cinema. Only a{few children}have a regular comic, have been in an aeroplane, go to Brownies(outside Clovelly), go to sunday School, and have been abroad.
